nodes.name: List of Ingredients and nutrients

parameters.text:
=
*"Approximate the kcals, protein, carbohydrates, lipids (fats), and electrolyte (sodium, potassium, magnesium, Zinc and Iron) content in the following dietary intake statement:  

{{ $json.chatInput }}

Provide estimates for each component based on typical nutritional values. Break down the contributions from each food item (steak, salad, vinaigrette) and give a total number for each nutrient.  

Give the total result as a json, with as name, the name of the nutrient, as quantity, the total summed value, and as unit the unit that been chosen (gr, mg).
Put the reasoning in another variable called "reasonning"

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Send a Telegram message
1. To your channel with the list of what you ate during your last meal. 
Your input can be a written or a voice message.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Setup
1. Create a telegram Bot by following the instructions [here]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
2. Create an empty Google sheet and set it in "Store in sheet" along with your credentials
3. Set your creadential for your OpenAI account

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content:
## Contact me
- If you need any modification to this workflow
- if you need some help with this workflow
- Or if you need any workflow in n8n, Make, or Langchain / Langgraph

Write to me: [thomas@pollup.net](mailto:thomas@pollup.net)

This a light version of My Meals. I have a working "Pro" version with searches in the USDA database for each ingredients that return ALL the Nutrients.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Chattrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Chattrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 15 different services: telegramTrigger, stickyNote, telegram, code, agent. It contains 29 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 29
- **Node Types**: 15
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When chat message received**: chatTrigger
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Structured Output Parser**: outputParserStructured
- **Get Audio File**: telegram
- **Transcribe Recording**: openAi
- **Limit**: limit
- **Receive Telegram message**: telegramTrigger
- **If it's a voice message**: if
- **Set chatInput from message**: set
- **Set chatInput from voice**: set
- ... and 19 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
